# Nano Banana AI Creative Platform - Complete Documentation

> Google's revolutionary AI model for advanced image generation and editing, featuring consistent character editing and scene preservation with state-of-the-art contextual understanding.

Nano Banana represents Google's next-generation approach to AI-powered visual creation, combining cutting-edge machine learning with intuitive text prompting for professional-grade image manipulation and generation. This groundbreaking model surpasses existing solutions like Flux Kontext with superior performance, faster inference speeds, and unmatched character consistency, providing creators with a complete AI creative ecosystem.

## Platform Overview

Nano Banana is more than just an image generation toolâ€”it's a comprehensive AI creative platform that integrates image generation, video creation, and image enhancement services. Our platform supports a complete creative workflow from Nano Banana image generation to Veo 3, Veo 3.1, and Sora 2 video generation, plus AI image enhancement, enabling creators to fulfill all their visual content needs in one unified platform.

## Core Services Detailed

### Nano Banana Image Generation

#### Text to Image Generation
Generate stunning, high-quality images from simple text prompts using Nano Banana's advanced Transformer-based architecture. The model understands complex scene descriptions, artistic styles, and can generate photorealistic or stylized outputs based on your requirements. With state-of-the-art natural language understanding, Nano Banana transforms your ideas into visual reality with unprecedented accuracy.

#### Image Editing Capabilities
Transform existing images with contextual understanding that preserves important elements while making targeted modifications. Nano Banana's image-to-image capabilities allow you to change expressions, add or remove objects, alter backgrounds, or completely reimagine scenes while maintaining the original's essence. The model excels at understanding spatial relationships and preserving image coherence.

#### In-Context Image Generation
Unlike traditional text-to-image models, Nano Banana performs in-context image generation by combining text and image inputs. This revolutionary approach enables seamless visual concept extraction and modification, delivering coherent renderings every time. You can use reference images to guide style, composition, or specific elements while using text to direct the creative process.

### Veo 3 AI Video Generator

#### Advanced Video Generation Technology
Veo 3 is Google's state-of-the-art AI video generation model that delivers exceptional video quality with support for 4K resolution. This powerful Veo 3 model generates highly realistic videos with improved physics simulation, natural movements, and photorealistic detail preservation. Whether you're creating from text or images, Veo 3 ensures professional results every time.

#### Dual-Mode Generation Capabilities
Experience seamless video creation with Veo 3's dual-mode generation:
- **Text-to-Video**: Convert text prompts into stunning video content
- **Image-to-Video**: Transform static images into dynamic content while maintaining visual consistency
- **Advanced Prompt Understanding**: Veo 3's sophisticated prompt adherence technology follows complex multi-scene instructions with unprecedented accuracy

#### Native Audio Generation
Veo 3 stands out with native audio generation capabilities. The Veo 3 model automatically generates synchronized sound effects, dialogue, and background audio that perfectly matches your video content. This unique Veo 3 feature brings your videos to life with professional audio quality, eliminating the need for additional audio post-production.

#### Creative Control Features
Unlock unlimited creativity with Veo 3's advanced controls:
- **Style Matching**: Use reference images for style matching
- **Character Consistency**: Maintain character consistency across scenes
- **Camera Movement**: Define camera movements and motion paths
- **Quality Options**: Support for 720P standard quality and 1080P HD upgrade

### Veo 3.1 AI Video Generator

#### Revolutionary Keyframe Control
Veo 3.1 introduces groundbreaking keyframe control technology, allowing you to precisely control the start and end frames of your AI video. This keyframe mode enables smooth cinematic transitions and gives your clips clear pacing and rhythm, ensuring every scene feels complete and intentional with advanced frame control capabilities.

#### Multi-Image Reference System
Guide your video's visual direction with Veo 3.1's multi-image reference technology. Provide different images to shape character design, lighting style, or color tone. Veo 3.1 ensures visual consistency across every shot, maintaining coherent aesthetics throughout your generated video with sophisticated multi-image reference processing.

#### Extended Duration Beyond 8 Seconds
Break through the traditional 8-second limit with Veo 3.1's extend feature. Naturally continue actions and narratives to create longer, more dynamic videos. Veo 3.1 allows seamless scene continuation, perfect for complex storytelling and professional video production that requires extended narrative flow.

#### Enhanced Native Audio and Sound Effects
Veo 3.1 automatically adds native audio to your creations, including dialogue, ambient sound effects, and action-synchronized audio. Audio perfectly syncs with visuals, enhancing immersion and realism. This eliminates the need for separate audio editing and brings videos to life with professional sound design.

#### Character Consistency Design
Upload character reference images to ensure consistent identity, appearance, and actions across every frame. Veo 3.1 maintains visual consistency across multiple scenes, creating smooth, professional narratives. This character consistency feature is ideal for character-driven storytelling and brand content creation.

### Sora 2 AI Video Generator

#### OpenAI's Breakthrough Technology
Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest AI video generation model that represents a major breakthrough in video AI technology. Unlike previous video generators that distort objects and bend reality, Sora 2 follows real-world physics laws with unprecedented accuracy. It can simulate complex scenarios like Olympic-level gymnastics, surfboard backflips with accurate buoyancy and rigidity dynamics, and natural object interactions.

#### Advanced Physics Simulation
Sora 2 delivers unprecedented physical accuracy with realistic motion effects and physics consistency:
- **Real Physics**: Basketballs bounce naturally, surfers demonstrate proper buoyancy dynamics
- **Object Permanence**: Objects maintain visual consistency throughout complex sequences
- **Gravity Simulation**: Accurate gravity effects and material property simulation
- **Motion Coherence**: Natural, fluid motion trajectories and action sequences

#### Dual-Mode Generation System
Sora 2 supports flexible video creation approaches:
- **Text-to-Video**: Create videos from pure text prompts, understanding complex scene descriptions
- **Image-to-Video**: Transform static images into dynamic motion sequences while maintaining visual coherence
- **Multi-Format Support**: Support for portrait and landscape formats, adapting to different platform needs
- **Flexible Duration**: Generate high-quality video content up to 15 seconds long

#### Barrier-Free User Experience
Our Sora 2 platform provides a convenient user experience:
- **No Watermark Output**: Generated videos have no watermarks and are ready for commercial use
- **No Invitation Code Required**: Start using immediately without waiting for invitations
- **No Download Needed**: Web-based online service, create anywhere, anytime
- **Instant Generation**: Fast processing with efficient creative workflows

### AI Image Upscaler

#### Professional-Grade Image Quality Enhancement
Nano Banana Image Upscaler uses advanced AI technology specifically designed to enhance the quality and resolution of Nano Banana-generated images. Our AI technology dramatically improves overall image quality and clarity while perfectly preserving complex details, transforming low-resolution photos into crisp, high-definition images.

#### Smart Upscaling Technology
Experience seamless image upscaling with cutting-edge algorithms:
- **High-Ratio Upscaling**: Scale images up to 4x their original resolution
- **Detail Preservation**: Maintain natural textures, sharp edges, and photorealistic details
- **Intelligent Algorithms**: Advanced AI algorithms ensure quality preservation throughout the upscaling process
- **Multi-Format Support**: Support for JPEG, PNG, WebP, and other image formats

#### Professional-Grade Processing Capabilities
Provide professional-level image processing features suitable for all types of users:
- **Photographer-Focused**: Studio-quality image enhancement effects
- **Designer Tools**: High-quality output meeting professional design requirements
- **Batch Processing**: Support for batch enhancement of multiple images
- **Noise Reduction**: Advanced noise reduction and detail enhancement features

#### Fast and Efficient Processing
Optimized processing engine ensures efficient workflows:
- **Second-Level Processing**: Complete image enhancement in seconds
- **High-Quality Output**: Guarantee quality without compromising speed
- **Instant Preview**: Real-time viewing of enhancement effects
- **One-Click Download**: Immediately download high-definition images after processing

## Key Technologies

### Character Consistency
Nano Banana preserves unique elements like reference characters or objects across multiple scenes and environments with unmatched accuracy. Whether you're creating a comic strip, maintaining brand mascots, or developing consistent character designs, the model ensures your subjects remain recognizable and true to their original appearance across different poses, expressions, and settings.

### Local Editing Precision
Make targeted modifications of specific elements without affecting the rest of your image. Nano Banana's advanced masking and attention mechanisms enable precise control over which parts of an image to modify. Change a person's clothing, alter facial expressions, or adjust individual objects while keeping everything else perfectly intact.

### Style Reference Innovation
Generate novel scenes while preserving unique styles from reference images. Nano Banana can extract and apply artistic styles, color palettes, and visual aesthetics from any reference, allowing you to maintain consistent visual branding or artistic direction across multiple generations. The model achieves this with minimal latency and maximum fidelity.

### Iterative Editing Mastery
Build upon previous edits through multiple turns while maintaining characters, identities, styles, and distinctive features. Nano Banana's memory and context understanding allow for complex multi-step transformations where each edit builds naturally on the previous one, enabling sophisticated creative workflows that were previously impossible.

## Performance Specifications

### Superior Speed
Nano Banana delivers industry-leading inference speeds, generating high-quality images in seconds rather than minutes. The model's optimized architecture ensures rapid response times even for complex editing tasks, making it suitable for real-time applications and high-volume production workflows.

### Quality Benchmarks
Consistently outperforms competing models in both automated metrics and human evaluation studies. Nano Banana achieves higher FID scores, better CLIP alignment, and superior user satisfaction ratings across diverse image generation and editing tasks.

### Scalability
Designed for enterprise-scale deployment with support for batch processing, parallel generation, and efficient resource utilization. Nano Banana can handle thousands of concurrent requests while maintaining consistent quality and performance.

## Pricing Plans

### Flexible Credit-Based System
We use a transparent credit-based pricing system, allowing you to pay only for the services you actually use. Credit consumption for different services:

#### Nano Banana Image Generation
- **Standard Generation**: 4 credits per image
- **High-Quality Generation**: 4 credits per image
- **Batch Generation**: Support for generating multiple images at once

#### Veo 3 Video Generation
- **720P Standard Quality**: Credits consumed based on mode and duration
- **1080P HD Upgrade**: Additional credits for HD quality upgrade
- **Fast Mode**: Fewer credits for quick generation
- **Quality Mode**: More credits for best quality output

#### Veo 3.1 Video Generation
- **Keyframe Control**: Premium credits for advanced frame control
- **Multi-Image References**: Additional credits for multiple reference processing
- **Extended Duration**: Extra credits for videos beyond 8 seconds
- **Enhanced Audio**: Included in standard generation cost

#### Sora 2 Video Generation
- **Standard Quality**: Base credit consumption
- **High-Definition Quality**: More credits for better effects
- **10-Second Videos**: Standard credit consumption
- **15-Second Videos**: More credits for longer duration support

#### AI Image Upscaler
- **3x Upscaling**: Base credit consumption
- **4x Upscaling**: More credits for highest quality
- **Batch Processing**: Support for multiple image processing

### Subscription Plans

#### Starter Plan - $9.99/month
Perfect for trying out AI creation and small projects:
- 200 AI generation credits monthly
- Access to all high-quality models
- Text-to-image generation
- Image editing features
- 3x, 4x image enhancement service
- Standard generation speed
- Standard customer support

#### Pro Plan - $23.99/month (Most Popular)
Ideal for creators, designers, and content professionals:
- 700 AI generation credits monthly
- Priority processing speed
- Advanced editing features
- Multi-image reference generation
- High-speed download channel
- Priority customer support
- Commercial license

#### Premium Plan - $89.99/month
For teams, agencies, and high-volume commercial use:
- 2000 AI generation credits monthly
- Fastest generation speed
- Most advanced AI editing capabilities
- Permanent image storage
- Dedicated account manager

### Credit Packs (One-time Purchase)
- **Starter Credit Pack**: 500 credits - $29.99 (Never expire)
- **Professional Credit Pack**: 2000 credits - $99.99 (Never expire)
- **Premium Credit Pack**: 7000 credits - $230 (Never expire)

## Use Cases

### Creative Industries
- Digital art and illustration creation
- Concept art for games and films
- Marketing and advertising visual design
- Social media content generation
- Book and magazine illustration production

### E-commerce
- Product visualization and mockup creation
- Virtual try-on experiences
- Product catalog image generation
- Marketing material creation
- Brand asset development

### Entertainment Industry
- Character design and development
- Storyboard creation
- Visual effects pre-visualization
- Comic and anime production
- Animation concept development

### Education Sector
- Educational material illustration
- Scientific visualization
- Historical recreation
- Interactive learning content
- Presentation enhancement

### Video Creation
- **Short Video Production**: Use Veo 3, Veo 3.1, and Sora 2 to create TikTok, Instagram Reels content
- **Advertising Videos**: Quickly produce product promotion and marketing videos
- **Educational Videos**: Create engaging educational and training content
- **Social Media**: Produce attractive social platform video content
- **Cinematic Content**: Leverage Veo 3.1's keyframe control for professional film production

## Getting Started

### Step 1: Platform Registration
Visit https://nanobanana.org to begin your AI creative journey. After registering an account, you'll receive free credits to experience all services. The intuitive interface design includes helpful tips and suggestions to guide you through the entire creative process.

### Step 2: Choose Your Service
Select the appropriate service based on your creative needs:
- **Image Creation**: Use Nano Banana for text-to-image generation or image editing
- **Video Production**: Choose Veo 3, Veo 3.1, or Sora 2 for video generation
- **Image Enhancement**: Use AI Image Upscaler to improve image quality

### Step 3: Create and Optimize
Use powerful text instructions to modify your images or videos. The models understand natural language commands like "make the sunset more vibrant" or "add a playful smile to the character." Use iterative features to gradually refine your creations while maintaining character consistency.

### Step 4: Download and Use
Preview your creative results and download high-quality images or videos when satisfied. All generated content supports commercial use and can be directly used for your projects, social media, or business purposes.

## API Integration

### REST API
Comprehensive RESTful API for seamless integration into existing workflows and applications. Support for all major programming languages with official SDKs for Python, JavaScript, Java, and Go.

### Batch Processing
Efficient batch processing capabilities for high-volume generation tasks. Process hundreds of images simultaneously with optimized resource allocation and priority queuing.

### Webhooks
Real-time notifications for generation completion, enabling asynchronous workflows and event-driven architectures.

## Technical Support & Resources

### API Integration
Comprehensive RESTful API for seamless integration into existing workflows and applications. Support for all major programming languages with official SDKs for Python, JavaScript, Java, and Go.

### Batch Processing
Efficient batch processing capabilities for high-volume generation tasks. Process hundreds of images or videos simultaneously with optimized resource allocation and priority queuing.

### Technical Documentation
Comprehensive technical documentation available at https://nanobanana.org/docs, including API references, best practices, and troubleshooting guides.

### Community Support
Active developer community with forums, Discord channels, and regular workshops. Share creations, get feedback, and learn from other users.

### Customer Service
Professional customer support team providing technical support through support@nanobanana.org. Typically responds within one business day to resolve any issues you encounter during use.

### Legal Information
- **Terms of Service**: https://nanobanana.org/terms-of-service - Complete terms of service and usage guidelines
- **Privacy Policy**: https://nanobanana.org/privacy-policy - Detailed privacy policy covering data processing, storage, and user rights
- **Refund Policy**: https://nanobanana.org/refund-policy - Refund terms and process descriptions

## Technical Architecture

### Model Foundation
Built on Google's latest transformer architecture with proprietary enhancements for visual understanding and generation. Trained on diverse, high-quality datasets with careful attention to bias mitigation and safety.

### Infrastructure
Deployed on Google Cloud Platform with global edge locations for low-latency access. Auto-scaling capabilities ensure consistent performance during peak usage periods.

### Security
Enterprise-grade security with encryption at rest and in transit. SOC 2 Type II certified with regular security audits and compliance monitoring.
